objects.text:
ELEVATE YOUR BRAND
IN A MINUTE

• Text-to-Graphic AI Platform
• Editable Design Files
• A/B Testing Capability
• Multiple Format Generation

product_details.name: Phot.AI
product_details.description:
I had a great conversation with Aishwarya Anand from CNBC-TV18 about how Phot.AI is different from other design platforms.



But first, let’s understand the problems with existing design tools:

🚫 You rely on manual processes and multiple apps → complex, bloated workflows

 🚫 Rigid templates → lack scalability and flexibility

 🚫 GenAI tools → only adjust layout, replace your text and product image

 🚫 No support for A/B testing, localization, or retail product-specific intelligence



The result? Clunky workflows that waste time ⏳, slow manual processes or template based designs 🛠️, and no easy way to create and test multiple ad variations at scale 🔄.



Text-to-image AI (like ChatGPT, Midjourney, Ideogram) is exciting—but let’s be honest. It doesn’t work for retail product brands/packaging



❌ No Editable design files

❌ No Understanding of brand tone

❌ No Banner formats

❌ No A/B testing

❌ No Automation



That’s why we need a shift from Text-to-Image ➝ Text-to-Graphic 



These platforms weren’t built for the fast-paced, data-driven world of retail product marketing, where you need thousands of creative assets across different sizes, languages, and target audiences — all optimized to boost sales 📈💰.



At Phot.AI, we focus solely on retail products. We help brands and sellers with everything — from taking product photos 📸 to cataloging 🗂️, to creating ads and marketing materials 🎨📢.



Most tools force you to do a lot of work by hand ✋, use fixed templates 📋, and switch between multiple apps 🔀. They give you pretty pictures 🖼️ but not powerful marketing graphics that actually drive sales 💸.



That’s why we built Phot.AI — introducing a new design paradigm.



Our text-to-graphic AI platform combines 5 AI agents working together to:

📷 Create real-looking product photos

🎨 Generate editable graphics and lifestyle creatives that match your brand

✍️🗣️ Write copy and calls-to-action that truly connect with your customers

🔍💥 Produce A/B test variations — colors, copy, backgrounds, sizes, languages, and target audiences — to discover what drives more clicks and sales

🌍🗣️ Translate your ads for global reachJust enter a prompt or upload a product image or link, and in under a minute ⏱️, you get everything ready — no hassle, no extra apps.



You’ll receive graphics maintaining all design layers like your PSD files, giving you full control to edit your banners anytime by chatting with the AI 💬 or using our design studio to tweak every detail. Our platform preserves all layers, just like traditional design tools.



We’re almost ready to launch 🚀 and can’t wait to share this with you.



If you want early access to Phot.AI CoPilot, comment below or send me a message.

banner_details:
This banner features a clean, modern layout with a tech-forward aesthetic. The background is divided into a grid-like pattern using deep blue tones, overlaid with fine white lines and semi-transparent geometric shapes for subtle texture. A large circular accent on the left adds visual emphasis. Text layer **heading** introduces the brand in bold white typography, while **subheading** offers a sleek, futuristic secondary message in light blue. Text layer **description** lists product benefits in bullet form, and **price** highlights affordability prominently. A rounded call-to-action button created by **cta_background** and **cta** invites user action. The visual centerpiece is **product_image**, displaying a modern appliance on the right.

**Color Palette:**  
- Midnight Navy: #101935  
- Blue Twilight: #192554  
- Royal Indigo: #0F1C42  
- Bright Azure: #3B63E8  
- Accent Blue: #5D7CE4  
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image features a modern stacked washer-dryer unit with a sleek, minimalistic color palette. Dominated by crisp white (#FFFFFF) on the unit body, it conveys cleanliness and modernity. The drum doors and surrounding bezels introduce deep black (#1A1A1A), adding sharp contrast and defining focal points. A metallic silver (#C0C0C0) control knob and accents blend subtly with the panel, adding a high-tech feel without overpowering. The digital display glows cool blue (#0096FF), providing a futuristic and engaging focal point. This balanced palette of white, black, silver, and blue can be extended into banner design to emphasize modernity, efficiency, and sophistication.
